resources.string: Click \"Show Answer\" to show answer. You will lose half a point.
The Rubik\'s Cube has 32 billion possible states
A standard Rubik\'s Cube has blue, green, red, orange, yellow, and white
If you twist a corner on a 3x3, it will become unsolvable until you twist it back
The center colors on a Rubik\'s Cube never change
The Rubik\'s Cube was invented by Nikola Tesla
It is impossible for only 4 out of 6 sides on the Rubik\'s Cube to be solved
The current world record holder for fastest single 3x3 solve is Feliks Zemdegs
Typically, Rubik\'s Cubes are held together by screws and springs
The world record time for a 3x3 solved blindfolded is 18.31 seconds
WELCOME TO MY RUBIK\'S CUBE QUIZ!!!
